name="DO0"><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="execute_command"><value name="command"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">playsound minecraft:entity.illusioner.cast_spell ambient @a[distance=..100] ~0.5 ~0.5 ~0.5 2 0 0.025</field></block></value><value name="x"><block
